Text: Aux Sable Contract Cc Lpst Patrice Thanks for the call the other day Here is a copy of our contract It is written with Aux Sable as an enduser in mind and therefore differs from the typical pipetopipe contract ASLP Master Inlet Gas Purchase Agreementdoc You can give me a call at if you have any questions If you have any questions on credit you can have your people contact me or Gerry OConnor our VP of Finance Gerry has been talking to Jennifer Shipohs I may have the spelling wrong of your Industrial group about financial instruments and credit Another name and number you should have is Bob Lee who is our short term days or less trader Bobs number is I look after longer term arrangements days or more and backup Bob when he is away Derek Ashing PS for Aux Sable Patrice is the Enron physical trader for Chicago Bob if you have any questions about what is being posted on Enron Online for Chicago this is the person to talk to Patrices number is ASLP Master Inlet Gas Purchase Agreementdoc
